name: Honey Soy Pork Belly Bites
keywords: Honey Soy Pork Belly Bites, Pork, Asian, Sweet, Salty, Snack, Ingredient, Pork Belly, Honey, Soy Sauce, Garlic, Ginger, Onion, Chilis, Sesame Oil, Sesame Seeds, Spring Onion, Appetizer, Side Dish, Easy, Quick, Flavorful, Glazed, Party Food
description: Delightfully scrumptious pork belly bites with a sweet and salty honey soy glaze, perfect as a snack or served with stir-fries or rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pork belly in a pan over medium heat for about 5-10 minutes until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Sear Pork Belly

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the pan and cook the pork on medium-low heat for another 50-60 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook Pork Belly

recipeInstructions.text: Uncover the pork and increase the heat. Add the onions, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil. Cook for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Aromatics

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chili, soy sauce, and honey to the pan. Cook until the sauce thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Add Glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Plate the pork belly bites and sprinkle with sesame seeds and diced spring onions.
recipeInstructions.name: Plate

notes: These pork belly bites are also great with a side of rice or noodles.
For extra crispy pork belly, you can finish them off under the broiler for a few minutes.
